props.name: children
props.description: Content rendered inside the main section of the login layout

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the login layout

props.name: footer
props.description: Footer component (e.g. <LoginFooter />)

props.name: header
props.description: Header component (e.g. <LoginHeader />)
Additional props are spread to the container <div>

props.name: children
props.description: Content rendered inside the footer of the login layout

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the login header
Additional props are spread to the container <footer>

props.name: children
props.description: Content rendered inside the footer Link Item

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the Footer Link Item

props.name: href
props.description: The URL of the Footer Link Item

props.name: target
props.description: Specifies where to open the linked document
Additional props are spread to the container <a>

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the Login Main Body's Form

props.name: showHelperText
props.description: Flag indicating the Helper Text is visible *

props.name: helperText
props.description: Content displayed in the Helper Text component *

props.name: usernameLabel
props.description: Label for the Username Input Field

props.name: usernameValue
props.description: Value for the Username

props.name: onChangeUsername
props.description: Function that handles the onChange event for the Username

props.name: isValidUsername
props.description: Flag indicating if the Username is valid

props.name: passwordLabel
props.description: Label for the Password Input Field

props.name: passwordValue
props.description: Value for the Password

props.name: onChangePassword
props.description: Function that handles the onChange event for the Password

props.name: isValidPassword
props.description: Flag indicating if the Password is valid

props.name: loginButtonLabel
props.description: Label for the Log in Button Input

props.name: isLoginButtonDisabled
props.description: Flag indicating if the Login Button is disabled

props.name: onLoginButtonClick
props.description: Function that is called when the Login button is clicked

props.name: rememberMeLabel
props.description: Label for the Remember Me Checkbox that indicates the user should be kept logged in.  If the label is not provided, the checkbox will not show.

props.name: isRememberMeChecked
props.description: Flag indicating if the remember me Checkbox is checked.

props.name: onChangeRememberMe
props.description: Function that handles the onChange event for the Remember Me Checkbox

props.name: rememberMeAriaLabel
props.description: Aria Label for the Remember me checkbox
Additional props are spread to the Form component

props.name: children
props.description: Content rendered inside the header of the login layout

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the login header

props.name: headerBrand
props.description: Header Brand component (e.g. <LoginHeader />)
Additional props are spread to the container <header>

props.name: children
props.description: Content rendered inside the Login Main Body

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the Login Main Body
Additional props are spread to the container <div>

props.name: children
props.description: Content rendered inside the Login Main Footer

props.name: socialMediaLoginContent
props.description: Content rendered inside the Login Main Footer as Social Media Links*

props.name: signUpForAccountMessage
props.description: Content rendered inside of Login Main Footer Band to display a sign up for account message

props.name: forgotCredentials
props.description: Content rendered inside of Login Main Footer Band do display a forgot credentials link*

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the Login Main Footer
Additional props are spread to the container <div>

props.name: children
props.description: Content rendered inside the footer Link Item

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the Footer Link Item
Additional props are spread to the container <a>

props.name: children
props.description: Content rendered inside the footer Link Item

props.name: href
props.description: HREF for Footer Link Item

props.name: target
props.description: Target for Footer Link Item

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the Footer Link Item
Additional props are spread to the container <a>

props.name: children
props.description: Content rendered inside the Login Main Header

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the Login Main Header

props.name: title
props.description: Title for the Login Main Header

props.name: subtitle
props.description: Subtitle that contains the Text, URL, and URL Text for the Login Main Header
Additional props are spread to the container <header>

props.name: children
props.description: Anything that can be rendered inside of the LoginPage (e.g. <LoginPageForm>)

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the LoginPage.

props.name: brandImgSrc
props.description: Attribute that specifies the URL of the brand image for the LoginPage

props.name: brandImgAlt
props.description: Attribute that specifies the alt text of the brand image for the LoginPage.

props.name: backgroundImgSrc
props.description: Attribute that specifies the URL of the background image for the LoginPage

props.name: backgroundImgAlt
props.description: Attribute that specifies the alt text of the background image for the LoginPage.

props.name: textContent
props.description: Content rendered inside of the Text Component of the LoginPage

props.name: footerListItems
props.description: Items rendered inside of the Footer List Component of the LoginPage

props.name: footerListVariants
props.description: Adds list variant styles for the Footer List component of the LoginPage.  Values are 'grid' or 'inline'

props.name: loginTitle
props.description: Title for the Login Main Body Header of the LoginPage

props.name: loginSubtitle
props.description: Subtitle for the Login Main Body Header of the LoginPage

props.name: signUpForAccountMessage
props.description: Content rendered inside of Login Main Footer Band to display a sign up for account message

props.name: forgotCredentials
props.description: Content rendered inside of Login Main Footer Band do display a forgot credentials link*

props.name: socialMediaLoginContent
props.description: Content rendered inside of Social Media Login footer section .
Additional props are spread to the Login component
